gameDetails.name: Deal with the Devil: Game-Expo Promo Event
gameDetails.description:
Promo card given to anyone whom bought the game directly from CGE at Spiel 2022. It was also part of the launch kit that brick and mortar stores could pre-order before the release. Later available as part of Pack Druid from the Dice Tower 2023 Kickstarter campaign.

It's an extra event for the B-deck. The left option gives you 4 coins at the cost of minus 2 reputation. The right option gives you plus 3 reputation if you pay 2 wheat.
